channel.title: ReaperXScape -Screw The Rest Play The Best-
channel.description:
[center] Hello, as you may know i am ReaperX, the owner of ReaperXScape Allstar 317. i am here for a whole new development thread about my server, not to advertise it but to flaunt my work, this server is hosted off hamachi for beta mode, (which is why this is a development thread and not an advertisement thread) and i understand that people hate hamachi :P well, i was almost portforwarded yesterday, it turns out, it didnt work lol. VPS is coming soon, so if you are interested in playing, you'll need to hold on.
Before you say "Wtf you have made 3 dev threads" i would like to clearly say, i have recovered this account and removed the other dev threads.
ok now to get onto the point....
server features : -new funpk! when you kill somebody at funpk they lose no items, and they will drop a good random item, or bones (more then likely) -every 1 hour minutes ingame you automatically receive 1gp - 200mgp -jar client (easy to use) -random events (being worked on) every couple mins, a random event comes, to stop stupid auto clicks! -new home area -yell titles (::titles to see the list ingame) -made antiSYI to block nulls/crashes or whatever SYI is... -working clan chats -when you kill a boss and get an item (except coins or bones) it sends a message to all players online of the drop! -working bank pins (they just dont save, i messed up my saving methods (being worked on)) -made 4 quests [the noclip tragedy], [the blood diamond], [the ice diamond], [excalibur ownage]. -void minigame -90% creds to owner of futurescape! -working dices (50x2, 70x3, 85x5) -dicer npc, enter the amount of 1b tickets to bet! -rares area! (drops are shouted to all players) -skill exp lamps (gives lvl 125 in random skill) -working and accurate boss drops (works for all bosses) -whenever you achieve lvl 125 in a skill, you get a mystery box (mystery box gives a random custom) -when you kill the custom dropping boss, he drops a custom 1/15 chance, so its rare -added super boss (drops pumpkin and rogue armour) -pumpkin heals 125 hp, and you can use infinity times (rare drop and super hard!) -rogue armour = very strong and when you wear the whole set you get + 150 maxhit -spined armour gives +120 maxhit -bandos, skeletal and armadyl armour sets being worn give bonus maxhits also -no more shops for bandos or armadyl -bandos armadyl and all other strong items are obtained from bosses -no more rares shops, rares are collectibles and not sellable to shops! -click the skills box on skills tab for quick chat skill levels! -*added command ::copy for admins, copy the armour that other players wear! -*added working flower game (with flower picking up) -*added summoning -*all boss areas are now safe zones -*new skills area -*most of the messages arnt as colorful and not as much distracting -*fixed messages sent after you get a rare drop -*woodcutting for logs instead of cash -*mining gives random ores -*fixed funpk and dying methods -*added mithril seeds as boss drops -*Working Runecrafting (at the abyss) -*Better XP lamps, normal 1 gives 500k xp, antique lamp gives 500k X your level in the skill -*You Can Only Open The Shops In The Quest Tab When Not In Combat -*::Bank For Mods Only Now -*New Mining Area -*Removed all ways to get customs, now you must get archery tickets (not yet descided how to achieve them) and then buy the customs at the shops at home. -::alchprice (itemid) tells you the amount the item will alch for, get nats from rcing -removed unnecessary commands -added barrows - 60% complete (will be finished today) -reduced colors in the sendMessages, because to much color is annoying and ugly.
~~~Newest updates~~~ -Fully Working Barrows (almost identical to real rs barrows, just the doors aren't 100%) -Over 60 Yell Titles To Choose From! -Fully Working Slayer (Easy, Medium, Hard Tasks) -New Skill : Dungeoneering (get xp from completing floors, no use for dung points yet...) -New Skill : Minigaming (complete Minigames For XP, This Skill Gives Combat Levels) -New Skill : Knowledge (answer math questions (easy) to obtain xp, this boosts maxhit) -New Skill : Hunter (not trainable yet) -Raffle System (Picks A Winner Every 30 Mins, The Rewards Given to players aren't working 100%, idk why) -Added cheat client "detector" blocks some of the cheats -Almost all skills work -Working items on death interface (shows items in invent, and being worn) -New Zombie Minigame (select a difficulty, and kill as many zombies as possible) (Still under construstion for bug fixes) -100% Working Anti Nuller/Anti SYI
~Those are only about 70% of the server features~
Some ingame pictures : [img]http://imgur.com/x3URZyg.png[/img] [img]http://imgur.com/tR7MuoA.png[/img] [img]http://imgur.com/I5LLOuI.png[/img] [img]http://imgur.com/2BhWvnu.png[/img] [img]http://imgur.com/NpbhN2A.png[/img] [img]http://imgur.com/ex0Kl30.png[/img] [img]http://imgur.com/fUSKoMN.png[/img] [img]http://imgur.com/u0vl80z.png[/img] [img]http://imgur.com/WrHTuMZ.png[/img]
[size=36pt]~~Latest Updates~~[/size] -Fixed Raffle -Custom Grand Exchange (GrandExchange.java - 60KB)
ok so here are the pictures for it. everything is accessed by first clicking on a bank well, everything except selling the items (from first clicking the bank you can also view your bank pin settings)
ok ill explain how this works before the pictures, you type ::sell ItemToSell PriceForItem (i need to find a simpler way for selling) when you do ::sell the item you sell goes on the list of the grand exchange items, the grand exchange only holds 20 items at the moment, but i will make 20-30 more spots. and maybe later on ill get a total of 80 slots, i dont know. ok when the item is assigned a slot, the slot is 1-20, and this is how you buy the item : you first click on the bank and click buy, then you are taken to the "enter amount" interface, and you type the slot that the item is in, if you have enough money you will get the item and the money will be deleted, if you dont have the money, it will say "you do not have enough money for this" to collect the money from your grand exchange after people buy your item, first click the bank and click grand exchange and then click "collect cash". the money you earned will be given to you. the next thing is taking an item out of the grand exchange before selling it, you first click the bank, then you click "remove item" and then the enter amount interface will come again, you type the slot of the item you want to take down, and if you are the owner of the item, it will work.
now for some pictures : [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/3qdsIff.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/eS8n0yE.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/0MKtXn3.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/WJDib0V.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/mIMih8p.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/0FNuPPB.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/DTq1SJt.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/m4zy8uc.png[/img]
[/center]

arham ur a tutorial author write one so allstar codes will <3 you lol.

item.source: ReaperXScape -Screw The Rest Play The Best-

item.title: ReaperXScape -Screw The Rest Play The Best-
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

[quote=“ReaperXScape, post:51, topic:521524”][quote author=arham 4 link=topic=640033.msg4320666#msg4320666 date=1372178691]

^^LOL^^

well i’m getting mad with myself lol… can’t think of anything unique to code

Forget about uniqueness at this step and focus on the core. Don’t cram**** everything and focus on your server in-general. Make that horribly programmed, server that can barely even hold 20 players be able to hold atleast 100 players (the rest can really be done by your vps (have fun spending more money :)))

Focus on the overall appeal on your server after that. You have enough content that we can play for more than 6+ hours (that’s very good). Focus on the big playerbase not the small one. You can’t think your server is already appealing if just a small playerbase likes it, you have to think out of the box when it comes to appeal (and of course content, but as I stated, you have enough content).

tldr; Forget uniqueness for now and focus on the core. Then focus on the appeal. It kinda disappoints me that you crammed content before fixing up the core. Now its going to be harder. Have fun with that…
[/quote]

arham, if only somebody showed me how to fix the “20 players” thing…[/quote]
Its not a glitch if your thinking that…

Its because the core is messed up (and other stuff that is beyond my knowledge).

Read full topic

[quote=“ReaperXScape, post:44, topic:521524”]^^LOL^^

well i’m getting mad with myself lol… can’t think of anything unique to code :/[/quote]
Forget about uniqueness at this step and focus on the core. Don’t cram**** everything and focus on your server in-general. Make that horribly programmed, server that can barely even hold 20 players be able to hold atleast 100 players (the rest can really be done by your vps (have fun spending more money :)))

Focus on the overall appeal on your server after that. You have enough content that we can play for more than 6+ hours (that’s very good). Focus on the big playerbase not the small one. You can’t think your server is already appealing if just a small playerbase likes it, you have to think out of the box when it comes to appeal (and of course content, but as I stated, you have enough content).

tldr; Forget uniqueness for now and focus on the core. Then focus on the appeal. It kinda disappoints me that you crammed content before fixing up the core. Now its going to be harder. Have fun with that…
